name: @coincise/binancefutures
description: Documentation extraction for Binance Futures API (USD-M, COIN-M, Options)

scripts.extract:all: npm run extract:general && npm run extract:endpoints:usdm:public:rest && npm run extract:endpoints:usdm:private:rest && npm run extract:endpoints:usdm:public:ws && npm run extract:endpoints:usdm:private:ws && npm run extract:endpoints:coinm:public:rest && npm run extract:endpoints:coinm:private:rest && npm run extract:endpoints:coinm:public:ws && npm run extract:endpoints:coinm:private:ws && npm run extract:endpoints:options:public:rest && npm run extract:endpoints:options:private:rest && npm run extract:endpoints:options:public:ws && npm run extract:endpoints:options:private:ws

author: Coincise
